trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la versione di connessione condivisa del <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> servizio utilizzato dal runtime.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: In questo contesto, connessione condivisa indica che il servizio utilizza la stessa connessione SQL per i servizi di rilevamento e la persistenza.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Il servizio SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService viene utilizzato per le transazioni di database che utilizzano una connessione condivisa tra oggetti diversi.

trans-unit.source: To use the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService invece del <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>nel <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>dell'istanza, utilizzare il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If the SQL server used by the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se il server SQL utilizzato da SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService è inattivo, ad esempio che ha causato da SQL del cluster di failover o problemi intermittenti della rete, SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService ritenterà il processo di commit fino a 20 volte prima che venga generato un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore viene richiamato quando il motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro Carica servizi da un file di configurazione dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is `EnableRetries`.
trans-unit.target: La chiave valida è `EnableRetries`.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Ciò richiede che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> ripetere in caso di una connessione di database non riuscita.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> classe utilizzando una stringa di connessione di database.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Stringa di connessione di database.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta un valore che specifica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> ritenterà l'esecuzione di un batch di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: Tentativi di lavoro commit del batch per <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>le attività devono essere definite nel flusso di lavoro (in genere utilizzando un po' di tempo ciclo e un gestore eccezioni all'esterno del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>non può eseguire tentativi in questo caso, perché non è stato avviato (e pertanto non possiede) la transazione.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Oltre a essere impostata a livello di programmazione, questa funzionalità può essere abilitata tramite un file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come impostare questa proprietà tramite un file di configurazione, vedere [i file di configurazione del flusso di lavoro](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni generali sul nuovo tentativo in corso transazioni di batch di lavoro, vedere [informazioni sullo stato dell'invio in batch nei flussi di lavoro](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il servizio deve ritentare l'esecuzione del commit del batch di lavoro; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo viene chiamato quando il runtime del flusso di lavoro genera il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo chiamato per avviare il servizio.
